Package utility

Class IO

java.lang.Object
utility.IO
public final class IO extends Object
This class comprises static methods used for reading and writing files.
Since:
2.0

  • Method Details

    • readLinesFromFile

      public static ArrayList<String> readLinesFromFile(String filePath) throws FileNotFoundException
      Reads a file and returns its content line-wise as list.
      Parameters:
      filePath - String representing a file path.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of String objects, each representing one line of the file accessed via the passed file path.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - If the specified file path does not lead to any file.

    • loadMusialDump

      public static MusialStorage loadMusialDump(File dumpFile) throws IOException, MusialException
      Initializes a MusialStorage object from a variants dictionary JSON file.
      Parameters:
      dumpFile - File pointing to the JSON file to parse.
      Returns:
      MusialStorage instance.
      Throws:
      IOException - If any error occurs while parsing the variants dictionary JSON file.
      MusialException

    • deleteDirectory

      public static void deleteDirectory(File file) throws IOException
      Accepts a File object representing a directory that is subject to deletion.
      Parameters:
      file - File specifying the directory to delete.
      Throws:
      IOException - If any file deletion procedure failed, for example the specified directory does not exist.

    • generateDirectory

      public static void generateDirectory(File file) throws MusialException
      Tries to generate the directory specified by the passed File object.
      Parameters:
      file - File object representing a directory.
      Throws:
      MusialException - If the directory could not be generated.

    • generateFile

      public static void generateFile(File file) throws MusialException
      Tries to generate the file specified by the passed File object.
      Parameters:
      file - File object representing a file.
      Throws:
      MusialException - If the file could not be generated.

    • writeFile

      public static void writeFile(File outputFile, String fileContent) throws MusialException
      Function to write a generic file with any line content.
      Parameters:
      outputFile - File object pointing to the output file.
      fileContent - String content to write to file.
      Throws:
      MusialException

    • compressFile

      public static void compressFile(File target)
      DEPRECATED Compress a target file using brotli.
      Parameters:
      target - File target to compress.
